players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Suspect Charlie, watch Diana. Villagers, stay cautious."
Diana: "Will watch out for Charlie. Stay alert, Villagers."
Charlie: "I'm the detective. Watch Diana and Charlie closely."
You: "Charlie, keep an eye on Diana. Mafia often hides among villagers."
Charlie: "Observing Diana & Charlie. Mafia likely among us."
Diana: "Observing Charlie and Diana. Stay cautious."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Suspect Charlie, watch Diana. Villagers, stay cautious."
Diana: "Will watch out for Charlie. Stay alert, Villagers."
You: "I'm the detective. Watch Diana and Charlie closely."
Alice: "Charlie, keep an eye on Diana. Mafia often hides among villagers."
You: "Observing Diana & Charlie. Mafia likely among us."
Diana: "Observing Charlie and Diana. Stay cautious."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
